### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41, -82)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(60, -60)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(106, -32)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position(63, -53)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### Pipe group at position(107, -34)
Consists of pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) and pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Belt group at position(40, -83)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)


### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities but being out of fuel
 -  Make sure to provide fuel to burner entities before using them
### Errors when using stone furnaces but having no ingredients
 -  Ensure that the stone furnace has the necessary ingredients before attempting to use it
### Errors when using steam engines but not being connected
 -  Connect the steam engine to a power source before attempting to use it
### Errors when using electricity groups but not being plugged into electric network
 -  Plug the electricity group into the electric network before attempting to use it
### Errors when using pipe groups but being empty
 -  Ensure that the pipe group has the necessary fluids before attempting to use it
### Errors when using belt groups but being empty
 -  Ensure that the belt group has the necessary items before attempting to use it

### NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned.
